 Nightlight/????::
The unconcios bot moaning. Nighlight said  looking to Aerotaur and Starstomp "Perhaps the best would be go to the ship now" 
  wingedwarrior41@... wrote: Starstomp: OOkydookie!!
She took some duct tape and taped the bot to Aerotaur.
Starstomp: That was the best I could find... sorry!
